title: 300: Q&A: Second Husbands, Favorite Positions, & Realizing It’s Our 300th Episode!
itunes:title: 300: Q&A: Second Husbands, Favorite Positions, & Realizing It’s Our 300th Episode!
description:
The Broads are here for a round of Q&A from the #broadsquad and mid episode realize it’s the 300th epsiode! But first they have a lengthy discussion/description of their second husbands (Bro’s response will come Friday). Then they dive head first into questions that lead to a mini existential crisis, questions that inspire a divorce conversation, how they met, potential Only F*ns pursuits, positions they love and hate, update on the open marriage chat, and lots more! 


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***HONEY: Get Honey for FREE at JOINHONEY.COM/CHATTY

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
